title: A decree of the Priuye Counsell at Westminster Anno 1.5.5.9.xx. October articles agreed uppon by the lordes and other the Quenes Maiesties Pryuy Counsayle, for a reformation of their seruauntes  in certayne abuses of apparell ...
author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
publisher: Bi Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cavvood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: Last complete line of text ends "this".
Imperfect: creased, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
